title: Essential Phone (PH-1): What you need to know about Andy Rubin's new modular Android phone | Trusted Reviews
description: ![]()Internally, the company has packed the phone with the latest **Qualcomm 835processor, 4GB of RAM** , and **128GB of storage** – so it should be plentyfast and able to compete with the big phones of 2017.And in what could be seen as a somewhat controversial move, Essential hasopted to follow Apple and leave out the 3.5mm jack – though an adapter is saidto be included with the phone.**Let us know what you think of the Essential Phone on social media.**
